channel.title: ANT error
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa307/Tk_The_Pk/compile.jpg[/img]
I look in the folder it sais to and all of a sudden the "tools" isnt there, I know its probably and easy fix but cna any tell me what do do, I also have the latest Java/JRE/Jdk

item.title: ANT error
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:4, topic:280097”][quote author=pkakidjr1 link=topic=369677.msg2797254#msg2797254 date=1243139854]

Simply edit compile.bat and remove

taskkill /F /IM java.exe

Save, try again.
[/quote]no the tools.jar thingy

Tools.jar has nothing todo with running or compiling a server.

But if you want it gone, set your paths to jdk instead of jre. Or drag and drop the tools.jar from the jdk folder to the jre folder.[/quote]Ok let me try it

Read full topic

item.title: ANT error
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“pkakidjr1, post:3, topic:280097”][quote author=adu link=topic=369677.msg2797249#msg2797249 date=1243139349]
Simply edit compile.bat and remove

taskkill /F /IM java.exe

Save, try again.
[/quote]no the tools.jar thingy[/quote]

Tools.jar has nothing todo with running or compiling a server.

But if you want it gone, set your paths to jdk instead of jre. Or drag and drop the tools.jar from the jdk folder to the jre folder.

Read full topic
